an4.3:1.1: “Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.3:1.5: ananuvicca apariyogahetva appasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti,
an4.3:1.6: ananuvicca apariyogahetva pasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti—
an4.3:1.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato balo abyatto asappuriso khatam upahatam attanam pariharati, savajjo ca hoti sanuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca apunnam pasavati.
an4.3:2.1: Catuhi, bhikkhave, dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavati.
an4.3:2.5: anuvicca pariyogahetva appasadaniye thane appasadam upadamseti,
an4.3:2.6: anuvicca pariyogahetva pasadaniye thane pasadam upadamseti—
an4.3:2.7: imehi kho, bhikkhave, catuhi dhammehi samannagato pandito viyatto sappuriso akkhatam anupahatam attanam pariharati, anavajjo ca hoti ananuvajjo ca vinnunam, bahunca punnam pasavatiti.
